00019 #ifndef GRAPH_H
00020 #define GRAPH_H
00021 
00022 #define ForEachVertex(u) for(u = 0 ; u < nbVertices ; u++)
00023 #define ForEachVertexOfG(g,u) for(u = 0 ; u < g->getOrder() ; u++)
00024 #define Degree(u) nbSucc[u]
00025 #define IThSucc(u,i) list[u][i]
00026 
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 #include <fstream>
00029 #include <vector>
00030 #include <set>
00031 
00032 
00033 class Graph {
00034         public :
00035         // load a graph from file filename
00036         // nauty txt format by default
00037         // other possible format is "dac"
00038         
00039         Graph(const std::vector<std::set<short> >& adjacencyMap)
00040         {
00041     nbVertices = adjacencyMap.size();
00042     nbEdges = 0;
00043     init();
00044     
00045     for(int i = 0; i < nbVertices; i++)
00046     {
00047       Degree(i) = adjacencyMap.size();
00048       list[i] = new short[Degree(i)];
00049       int pos = 0;
00050       for(std::set<short>::const_iterator it = adjacencyMap[i].begin(); it != adjacencyMap[i].end(); ++it, ++pos)
00051         list[i][pos] = *it;
00052       assert(pos == Degree(i));
00053       nbEdges += Degree(i);
00054     }
00055         }
00056         
00057         Graph(const char * filename,const char * format = NULL) {
00058                 if(format == NULL) {
00059                         int i,u,v;              
00060                         int tempNbSucc;
00061                         nbEdges=0;
00062                         
00063                         FILE * in = fopen(filename,"r");
00064                         if(in == NULL) {
00065                                 cerr << "Can't open file " << filename << endl;
00066                                 exit(-1);
00067                         }
00068                         
00069                         fscanf(in,"\nGraph %d, order %d.\n",&u,&i);
00070                         nbVertices = (short int)i;
00071                         init();
00072                         for(i = 0 ; i < nbVertices ; i++) {
00073                                 tempNbSucc = 0;
00074                                 fscanf(in, "%d : ",&i);
00075                                 v = fscanf(in,"%d",&u);
00076                                 while(v > 0) {
00077                                         temp[tempNbSucc] = u;
00078                                         tempNbSucc++;
00079                                                 nbEdges++;
00080                                         v = fscanf(in,"%d",&u);
00081                                 }
00082                                 fscanf(in,";");
00083                                 
00084                                 Degree(i)=tempNbSucc;
00085                                 list[i] = new short[Degree(i)];
00086                                 for(v = 0 ; v < Degree(i) ; v++) {
00087                                         list[i][v] = temp[v];
00088                                 }
00089                         }
00090                         fclose(in);
00091                 } 
00092         };
00093         
00094         // build a new graph isomorphic to G2
00095         // vertices correspondance are done by the vector t
00096         Graph(const Graph * G, short * t) {
00097                 int u,j;
00098                 nbVertices = G->getOrder();
00099                 nbEdges = 0;
00100                 init();
00101                 for(u = 0 ; u < nbVertices ; u++) {
00102                         list[t[u]] = new short[G->getDegree(u)];
00103                         Degree(t[u]) = G->getDegree(u);
00104                         for(j = 0 ; j < G->getDegree(u) ; j++) {
00105                                 nbEdges++;
00106                                 list[t[u]][j] = t[G->getIThSucc(u,j)];
00107                         }
00108                 }
00109         }
00110         
00111         // destructor
00112         ~Graph(void) {
00113                 int i;
00114                 ForEachVertex(i) {
00115                         delete [] list[i];
00116                 }
00117                 delete [] list;
00118                 delete [] nbSucc;
00119                 delete [] temp;
00120         };
00121         
00122         void print(void) {
00123                 int i,j;
00124                 for(i = 0 ; i < nbVertices ; i++) {
00125                         cout << "V" << i << " : ";
00126                         for(j = 0 ; j < Degree(i) ; j++) {
00127                                 cout << list[i][j] << " ";
00128                         }
00129                         cout << endl;
00130                 }
00131         }
00132         
00133         void printSaucy(void) {
00134                 cout << nbVertices << " " << nbEdges << " 1" << endl;
00135                 int i,j;
00136                 for(i = 0 ; i < nbVertices ; i++) {
00137                         for(j = 0; j < Degree(i) ; j++) {
00138                                         cout << i << " " << list[i][j] << endl;
00139                         }
00140                 }
00141         }
00142         
00143         // return the number of neighbours of the vertex v
00144         inline const short getDegree(const short v) const {return Degree(v);};
00145         
00146         // return the id of the ith neighbour of v
00147         // arbitrary order, used to iterate over the neighbours
00148         inline const short getIThSucc(const short v, const short i) const {return IThSucc(v,i);};
00149         
00150         // return the number of vertices of the graph
00151         inline const short getOrder(void) const {return nbVertices;};
00152         
00153         // return the number of edges of the graph
00154         inline const int getNbEdges(void)const  {return nbEdges;};
00155         
00156         inline const bool isAnEdge(const short u, const short v) const {
00157                 for(int i = 0 ; i < getDegree(u) ; i++) {
00158                         if(getIThSucc(u,i) == v) return true;
00159                 }
00160                 return false;
00161         }
00162         
00163         protected :
00164         
00165         // number of vertices of the graph
00166         short nbVertices; 
00167         
00168         // number of edges of the graph
00169         int nbEdges;
00170         
00171         // for each vertex, the list of this successor
00172         short **list;
00173         
00174         // number of successor of a vertex
00175         short * nbSucc;
00176         
00177         // adjacency matrix (true, false)
00178         //bool ** adjMatrice;
00179         short * temp;
00180         
00181         // memory allocation
00182         void init(void) {
00183                 int i;
00184                 list = new short*[nbVertices];
00185                 nbSucc = new short[nbVertices];
00186                 ForEachVertex(i) {
00187                         nbSucc[i] = 0;
00188                 }
00189                 temp = new short[nbVertices];
00190         };
00191 };
00192 
00193 #endif
